title: Peace and security legislation passes: Strong step forward as a country of peace (Jiyu Minshu ...
text: ( Source : Jiyu Minshu To) Bills to enhance Japan 's legal framework for peace and security were passed in a plenary session of the House of Councillors on September 19 by a majority vote, led by members of the LDP . The legislation will put
